textContent:
Hey there Umair! ğŸ¥º

Like you said, the bond which we share is special, it doesn't come easily to everyone. Sometimes life gives us something so rare and beautiful that it almost feels unreal (especially after we've had gone through a lot in the past.) That’s what you are to me. ğŸ¥º

I know things haven’t been perfect. We’ve had moments of doubt, anger, anxiety, overthinking, and tears. But despite that, one thing remains clear in my heart that I love you. And I’m not giving up on us. 

Relationships aren’t easy, especially for me that too when distance, differences, and fears come in the way. But I believe that if two people are willing to try, like really try, then love can still win. And I am willing. I want us to keep choosing each other, even on the days it feels hard. ğŸ¥º 

Let this be a reminder for both of us, We’re not alone in this. We’ve got each other, and more importantly, we’ve got God walking with us through every challenge and every beautiful moment. So let’s be patient. Let’s be honest. Let’s heal where it hurts and grow stronger together. 

We may not have all the answers now, but we have a chance, and that’s something worth holding on to.ğŸ©·


Here's a Prayer for Us ğŸ¤§

Heavenly Father,
We come before You with open hearts, asking You to bless our relationship. Be the center of our love, the healer of our wounds, and the guide for our future. Strengthen the bond we share and help us trust each other the way You call us to. Teach us to love with grace, to forgive quickly, and to communicate with gentleness and truth.
If this relationship is Your will, Lord, then help us protect it, nurture it, and grow within it. And if we ever lose our way, please show us the path that leads back to You and to each other.
In Jesus’ name, Amen.
textContentHtml:
Hey there Umair! ğŸ¥º


Like you said, the bond which we share is special, it doesn't come easily to everyone. Sometimes life gives us something so rare and beautiful that it almost feels unreal (especially after we've had gone through a lot in the past.) That’s what you are to me. ğŸ¥º


I know things haven’t been perfect. We’ve had moments of doubt, anger, anxiety, overthinking, and tears. But despite that, one thing remains clear in my heart that I love you. And I’m not giving up on us. 


Relationships aren’t easy, especially for me that too when distance, differences, and fears come in the way. But I believe that if two people are willing to try, like really try, then love can still win. And I am willing. I want us to keep choosing each other, even on the days it feels hard. ğŸ¥º 


Let this be a reminder for both of us, We’re not alone in this. We’ve got each other, and more importantly, we’ve got God walking with us through every challenge and every beautiful moment. So let’s be patient. Let’s be honest. Let’s heal where it hurts and grow stronger together. 


We may not have all the answers now, but we have a chance, and that’s something worth holding on to.ğŸ©·



Here's a Prayer for Us ğŸ¤§


Heavenly Father,

We come before You with open hearts, asking You to bless our relationship. Be the center of our love, the healer of our wounds, and the guide for our future. Strengthen the bond we share and help us trust each other the way You call us to. Teach us to love with grace, to forgive quickly, and to communicate with gentleness and truth.

If this relationship is Your will, Lord, then help us protect it, nurture it, and grow within it. And if we ever lose our way, please show us the path that leads back to You and to each other.

In Jesus’ name, Amen.
